As you can see, there is no extension GL_ARB_geometry_shader4. So i can't use sf::Shader with geometry shader because of [this](https://github.com/SFML/SFML/blob/master/src/SFML/Graphics/Shader.cpp#L818), although i can actually use the geometry shader via direct OpenGL calls. Do we realy need this extension check for context 3.2+?
_P.S. Sorry for my English_
